casebody.data:
Holman Rentals, L.L.C., Appellee, v. Wood County Board of Revision et al., Appellants.

[Cite as Holman Rentals, L.L.C. v. Wood Cty. Bd. of Revision, 144 Ohio St.3d 125, 2015-Ohio-3820.]

(No. 2013-1826 Submitted September 18, 2014 Decided September 23, 2015.) Per Curiam. *126Rich & Gillis Law Group, L.L.C., Kelly A. Gorry, and James R. Gorry, for appellants.

{¶ 1} The decision of the Board of Tax Appeals is vacated, and the cause is remanded for further proceedings in light of Ginter v. Auglaize Cty. Bd. of Revision, 143 Ohio St.3d 340, 2015-Ohio-2571, 37 N.E.3d 1207.

Decision vacated and cause remanded.

O’Connor, C.J., and Pfeifer, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, Kennedy, French, and O’Neill, JJ., concur.
